definition.value: A planned process to administer opioid analgesics intravenously in order to induce total or partial loss of sensation especially tactile sensation and pain.
A planned process to administer muscle relaxant intravenously in order to relax skeletal muscles and reduce muscle contraction.
A planned process to administer anaesthetic in the form of a gas aerosol or fine powder via the respiratory tract usually by oral or nasal inhalation for local or systemic effect.
A planned process to administer anaesthetic in order to produce a loss of feeling.
A planned process to administer insulin during a surgical procedure.
A planned process to administer steroid during a surgical procedure.

label.value: administration of antimicrobial agent during surgery

definition.value: A planned process to administer antimicrobial agent(s) during a surgical procedure.
A planned process to administer medication(s) during a surgical procedure.
A data item that reports the time of day at which the first incision is made during surgery.
A surgical procedure in which the anus, rectum, and sigmoid colon are removed.
A colectomy that is the surgical removal of the left side of the large intestine.
A colectomy that is the surgical removal of the sigmoid colon.

A colectomy that involves removing the cecum, the ascending colon, the hepatic flexure (where the ascending colon joins the transverse colon), the first one-third of the transverse colon, and part of the terminal ileum, along with fat and lymph nodes.
A colectomy that is complete resection of the colon
A colectomy that is resection of part of the colon or a resection of all of the colon without complete resection of the colon
A colectomy that is resection of the transverse colon along with the middle colic vessels and its mesentery.
A surgical procedure that is done to treat cancer of the rectum in which the part of the rectum containing the cancer is removed. The remaining part of the rectum is reconnected to the colon.
A surgical procedure to remove all or part of the rectum. It is often needed to treat rectal cancer.
A colectomy that is the surgical removal of the rectum and all or part of the colon.[
A colectomy that is the surgical removal of the rectum and sigmoid colon.

label.value: time of first clamp for specimen removal

definition.value: A data item that reports the time of day when the first clamp was applied to the vasculature of an organ for specimen collection.

label.value: time of second clamp for specimen removal

definition.value: A data item that reports the time of day when the second clamp was applied to the vasculature of an organ for specimen collection.
A time measurement datum of the period between organ resection and the time of first clamping perfomed in vivo.

label.value: vital sign blood pressure variance early in organ excision

definition.value: A data item on the duration of blood pressure variances of greater than 20 mmHg from a patient's pre-operative baseline from the time of anesthesia induction to 15 minutes post.

label.value: vital sign blood pressure variance late in organ excision

definition.value: A data item on the duration of blood pressure variances of greater than 20 mmHg from a patient's pre-operative baseline from 15 minutes post anesthesia induction to the organ excision.

label.value: first temperature recorded in operating room of specimen donor

definition.value: A time stamped measurement datum that is the first temperature recorded in the operating room of the specimen donor.

label.value: second temperature recorded in operating room of specimen donor

definition.value: A  time stamped measurement datum that is the second temperature recorded in the operating room of the specimen donor.

label.value: oxygen desaturation epochs prior to organ excision description

definition.value: A comment from tissue procurement of the epochs of oxygen desaturation of less than 92% for more than 5 minutes prior to organ excision.

label.value: carbon dioxide level of specimen donor recorded at time closest to organ excision

definition.value: A measurement datum of the level of carbon dioxide gas at time closest to organ exiscion from the specimen donor.
A measurement datum of the volume of albumin administered during surgery.

label.value: amount of packed red blood cells administered intraoperatively

definition.value: A count of the number of units of packed red blood cells administered during surgery.
A measurement datum of the volume of platelets administered during surgery measured.

label.value: amount of fresh frozen plasma administered intraoperatively

definition.value: A count of the number of units of fresh frozen plasma administered during surgery.

label.value: specimen donor intraoperative blood loss volume measurement datum

definition.value: A measurement datum of the volume of intraoperative blood loss from the specimen donor.

label.value: specimen donor intraoperative blood loss prior to organ excision volume measurement datum

definition.value: A specimen donor intraoperative blood loss volume measurement datum obtained prior to organ excision.

label.value: specimen donor intraoperative blood loss at end of surgery volume measurement datum

definition.value: A specimen donor intraoperative blood loss volume measurement datum obtained at the end of surgery.

label.value: specimen donor intraoperative urine excreted volume measurement datum

definition.value: A measurement datum of the volume of intraoperative urine excreted obtained from the specimen donor during surgery.

label.value: specimen donor intraoperative urine excreted prior to organ excision volume measurement datum

definition.value: A specimen donor intraoperative urine excreted volume measurement datum obtained during prior to organ excision.

label.value: specimen donor intraoperative urine excreted at end of surgery volume measurement datum

definition.value: A specimen donor intraoperative urine excreted volume measurement datum obtained at the end of surgery.

label.value: indicator of ascites fluid collection during surgery

definition.value: An information content entity that is an indication of whether ascites fluid was collected from the specimen donor during organ excision.

label.value: ascites fluid from specimen donor during surgery volume measurement datum

definition.value: A measurement datum of the volume of ascites fluid collected from the specimen donor during surgery.

label.value: Duration of fasting by specimen donor prior to surgery

definition.value: A time measurement datum of the duration of fasting by the specimen donor prior to surgery.

label.value: comment on donor pre-operative bowel preparation prior to surgery

definition.value: A comment from tissue procurement of the pre-operative bowel preparation performed prior to surgery.

label.value: comment on notable events during donor surgery

definition.value: A comment from tissue procurement of notable events that occurred during surgery.
A data item indicating the time at which the surgical specimen left the operating for delivery to the pathology gross room.
A surgical procedure with the removal of the uterus, cervix, fallopian tubes, and ovaries. This is the most common surgery done for endometrial cancer.
A surgical procedure with the removal of the uterus, cervix, left fallopian tube, and left ovary.
A surgical procedure with the removal of the uterus, cervix, right fallopian tube, and right ovary.
A surgical procedure with the removal of both ovaries.
A surgical procedure with the removal of the left ovary.
